name: Farm Horse Simulator
description:
Are you ready to grow your product in farm and sell them at the market?

We provide you brand new Farm Horse Simulator series. Challenging town roads are waiting for you.
Carry farm products to market without damaging them.

- 30 Excellent Level
- 6 Horses
- Every horse has special carry capacity
- Challenging roads
- 4 Camera Angles
- Great Farm and Market places
- 5 Cart
- 8 Farm product
- Realistic 3D graphics.
- Realistic horse riding and physic.
- Historical farmer clothes and town people.
- Wild Horse Simulator

Gameplay
- Use direction keys to move your horse.
- Adjust your speed by using fast or slow buttons.

Tricks
- You can prevent damaging products by slowing down at steep roads.
- You can carry better products by purchasing new horse and cart at Kingdom Market.
- Less damaged products provide you more coins at the market.
